snippet: The police and education officials on Thursday moved to shut down 14 universities that the government determined did not meet basic academic standards.
abstract: Ecuadorean police and education officials move to shut down 14 universities that the government determined did not meet basic academic standards; the move is part of a broad effort to improve higher education in the country.
lead_paragraph: The police and education officials on Thursday moved to shut down 14 universities that the government determined did not meet basic academic standards.
